notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: The subject and its reach have been designed by A.G., J.V. and T.G., with the assistance of the remaining authors in different points. A.G., M.P. and U.D. performed the database work to select and treat the ethnobotanical information of the areas chosen. O.H. carried out the phylogenetically informed analyses. A.G. and T.G. carried out the statistical analyses. A.G., J.V. and T.G. wrote a first version of the manuscript, which was read and discussed by the remaining authors. Finally, A.G. and J.V. prepared the final version of the manuscript, which was read and approved by all the authors. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
